author: Special Correspondent
text:
The city police have arrested a man along with a swanky car with a fake registration number, cash, five mobile phones and 10 SIM cards at Uthangudi near here on Thursday.

The police picked up M. Jagadeesan (25) of Vellore on seeing the fake registration number on the car parked on Melur Road. They found Rs. 66,000 in cash of various denominations in the car. When he could not account for the money and give details about the owner, who he said had left the car, the police arrested him. He was booked on charges of using a fake registration number and theft. The car and other things were seized.

The K. Pudur police are on the lookout for a suspect.
title: Man held with swanky car
